[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=5544) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You fail a Reflex saving throw

</column>

---

You instinctively twist away from danger. Reroll the triggering saving throw and use the better result.

<title level="2">Cat's Luck leads to...</title>
[Luck of the Clowder](/Feats.aspx?ID=5559), [Lucky Break](/Feats.aspx?ID=5553), [Reliable Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=5566)
